Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientNotificationListener
public class ClientController extends Object implements ClientNotificationListener
Class that represents the controller of the client

    • createGame

      public void createGame(String nickname, int numOfPlayers, boolean easyRules)
      Sends a message to the server to create a lobby.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who creates the lobby
      numOfPlayers - the number of players in the lobby
      easyRules - true if the easy rules are used, false otherwise

      coordinates - the coordinates of the tiles to pick

    • putTiles

      public void putTiles(Integer column, List<Integer> order)
      Sends a message to the server to insert the selected tiles.
      Parameters:
      column - the column where to insert the tiles
      order - the order of the tiles to insert
